DOC.brief_summary: This study test investigational vaccine , call DRibbles , treatment non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . We hypothesize vaccination DRibble vaccine cause immune response protein contain DRibble vaccine protein antigens target strong immune response include common antigen share vaccine patient 's tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Vaccine Immunotherapy ( DRibbles ) Patients With Definitively-Treated Stage III Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomize study first 33 patient assign receive either : - DRibbles vaccine HPV vaccine - DRibbles vaccine , HPV vaccine , imiquimod - DRibbles vaccine , HPV vaccine , GM-CSF After 11 patient assign group , study arm great number vaccine-induced strong antibody response continue enrollment 15 patient . The primary objective determine best strategy induce strong ( > 15 fold ) tumor-specific tumor-associated antibody responses patient stage III A B NSCLC . The goal select one regimen advance additional clinical trial .
DOC.criteria: Stage IIIA IIIB histologically proven nonsmall cell lung cancer Completion definitive therapy Enrollment 28 day 12 week completion definitive therapy Toxicities definitive therapy resolve less grade 1 ECOG performance status 01 Negative pregnancy test woman childbearing potential Agree avoid pregnancy father child study treatment Ability give inform consent comply protocol Anticipated survival minimum 6 month Prior therapy investigational agent must complete least 3 week prior study enrollment Normal organ marrow function define specific lab test Archived tumor tissue available Active autoimmune disease except vitilogo hypothyroidism Active malignancy Known HIV+ and/or Hepatitis B C positive Medical psychiatric condition would preclude safe participation Ongoing chemotherapy
